author: jgallimore
msg: OPENEJB-869 - publish was failing on WTP 3 due to a change in the API - ModuleFile has a slightly different hierarchy, so if we don't find the file field on the ModuleFile itself, we try the superclass. We're using reflection here as the class is internal to another plugin, is there a better way of doing this?
